title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 76.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 76.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

To provide for expeditious administrative proceedings to correct and to impose penalties for violations of the State Sanitary Code, Public Health Law and pertinent provisions of the administrative rules and regulations of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
76.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
